name: Guinea-Pig
description: Guinea Pig is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass a variety of energetic levels for the rabbit. Your main purpose in this game is to collect tablets in each level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP SP3 / Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i9 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 250 MB available space
